attributes.action: under take a review of the current 2 party political system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The two party political system which has served this country well for hundreds of years is now under threat by the beligerant attitude of our MPS.We need to bring in a system which elects a broader range of people serve our country and make them aware with absolute clarity that they are there to serve the people.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
